titles.title: Recognizing the 150th anniversary of the birth of General John J. Pershing, an American military hero.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
5/12/2010--Introduced. Recognizes the 150th anniversary of the birth of General John J. Pershing.
Extends the appreciation of a most grateful nation for his service to the United States.
